title: First M.E.T. student graduates, a year early
author: Maya Mirsky
excerpt:
Avanthika Ramesh has more than one “first” under her belt. Not only is she the first student to finish UC Berkeley’s Management, Entrepreneurship & Technology (M.E.T.) program, she’s also the first to finish a year early. A joint program launched in 2017 by Berkeley Haas and the College of Engineering, M.E.T. allows students to earn […]
